line_1: An half writ eclogue, and a riddle.
line_2: With these, an inkhorn and a fiddle,

line_1: Yes, do be angry — 'tis a Riddle.
line_2: Well, now what is't? — what is't — a fiddle! —

line_1: When, Behold the next Morning, a wonderful Riddle,
line_2: He found it was strangely fill'd in the Middle.
